document_data.name: Scatterstars
document_data.mainbody: '''Scatterstars''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]].{{Cite dragon/281/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Treasures of Cormyr, Part 4|78}}
document_data.Activities: The Scatterstars made their fortune in the shipping business in [[Suzail]].
document_data.History: [[Elbryn Scatterstars]] was the head of the family and served King [[Dhalmass Obarskyr]] in the early 1200s [[DR]] as something of a seneschal for the [[Castle Obarskyr|Palace]]. In appreciation for being a discrete caretaker, a cultured host, and an attentive manager, Dhalmass elevated the family to nobles.
document_data.Members: * Elbryn Scatterstars, first ennobled in the early 13{{th}} century DR.
